thread.title_full: Second Hawthorn player questioned by police over alleged sexual assault

title: Second Hawthorn player questioned by police over alleged sexual assault
text: Second Hawthorn player questioned by police over alleged sexual assault Sunday, 18 October 2015 (12 minutes ago) · AFL premiers confirm second Hawks player under investigation by police · Incident allegedly occurred six days after the club’s grand final win Hawthorn have confirmed a second AFL player is under investigation by police over an alleged sexual offence earlier this month. Related: Hawthorn players reportedly under ... Allred to Tear Into Cosby Over Sexual Assault Allegations 01:00 CNN reports famed attorney Gloria Allred is said to be interrogating 78-year-old comedian Bill Cosby under oath Friday. She'll grill him about his alleged serial doping and sexual assault of young women, and says no question is off-limits. A video camera will likely be rolling. However, what it... Recent related news A second Hawthorn player is being investigated in connection with an alleged sexual assault. Sydney Morning Herald 1 hour ago - Front Page UPDATE: A SECOND Hawthorn player is being investigated over an alleged sexual assault following a n accusation by a 19-year-old woman. Herald Sun 1 hour ago - Australia Hawthorn have confirmed a second AFL player is under investigation by police over an incident earlier this month. The Age 1 hour ago - Australia TWO unidentified Hawthorn Hawks players are currently being investigated by Victorian police over an alleged sexual assault earlier this month. Perth Now 2 days ago - Australia A Hawthorn player is under police investigation over an alleged sexual offence in Melbourne's south-east. The Age 2 days ago - Front Page
